content.description: North facing wide crack, wraps around west side and up
content.location: This route is literally right on the trail, a short distance passed the turn off to the Finger. We climbed this thing in maybe 1991 with a rack purchased at a yard sale. I have no idea how hard it is, but I remember running to the top off of a small RP.    My partner rapped off of my waist, then I rapped off of his waist down the other side of the Pinnacle.   I heard that an anchor has been added.

content.description:
The Ignorance is Bliss area is on the Finger Rock Trail a short distance past the turnoff to the Finger.    ISB Pinnacle is the first formation of many within the next quarter mile or so. This the only thing that I have done in the area after the right turn in the trail past the turn-off to the Finger. I have found other evidence of climbing activity around the larger more prominent formations just up trail. I do not know where Trials and Tribulations is. 

  This area is within 500' of the Trail and is not limited by the spring closure.
